Package test

Test framework to test unknown implementations.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Input
    Contains helper methods to generate input for tests.
    InteractiveConsoleTest
    Contains some useful methods for testing with the interactive console.
    KitMatchers
    Contains Matchers that are not provided #org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers but needed by a test.
    TestObject
    Gives you the ability to test a class you don't know the implementation of.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SystemExitStatus
    Represents a status System.exit(int) can be called with.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TestMethodException
    Thrown if an exception that was set to be rethrown occurs while running a test method of TestObject.

Package test Description

Test framework to test unknown implementations. The core class is TestObject. It encapsulates the implemented class and provides methods to run tests on it.
